reviewText: This is NOT Carl Palmer's drumming.  Don't know what it is, but the audio ain't him!  Perhaps tthey took 30 seconds of a performance and slowed it down to fill ten minutes.
Who would ever then think of putting a midi soundtrack to this.  There's 10 minutes of my life that I will never get back.

Here are my reasons:

1. Video is of Carl, audio is NOT.
2. The actual video is in slow motion so the "drum-synching" electronic drummer can "play" Carl's solo.
3. Did I mention it is a steaming pile of crap?

This video is a TOTAL disservice to Carl. (Period)

LOVE IT. It Could use some interviews though. It shows how he is playing his solos live. It also has the same solos in slow motion with midi drum tracks to get a better idea on how his drumming is being played.
Promo Video for Carl Palmer's "Drum Solos" DVD, distributed by MVD Visual.
